sentence.Network_en: It would seem more sensible to apply standards flexibly rather than rigidly.
sentence.Network_cn: 灵活地运用标准比死守标准会显得更合情合理。

sentence.Network_en: His poor method of learning by rote made him unable to deal with the problems in his work flexibly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他死记硬背的学习方法使他在工作中不能灵活处理问题.

sentence.Network_en: Being able to develop English thinking, mother - tongue understanding, communicate and applicate flexibly.
sentence.Network_cn: 能够形成英语式思维, 母语式的理解能力.可以灵活自如地交流和运用.

entry.def: A flexible object or material can be bent easily without breaking.

entry.tran: 易变通的;适应性强的;灵活的
entry.def: Something or someone that is flexible is able to change easily and adapt to different conditions and circumstances as they occur.

example.ex: Look for software that's flexible enough for a range of abilities.
example.tran: 寻找功能多、适用性强的软件。

sentences.sentence: "`Come whenever you are free,' he said flexibly"

auth_sentence.content: The funds can be allocated flexibly towards covering salaries and research costs.
auth_sentence.res_content: The funds can be allocated flexibly towards covering salaries and research costs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The funds can be allocated flexibly towards covering salaries and research costs.

auth_sentence.content: So we have discussed ways of us engaging all the key actors flexibly.
auth_sentence.res_content: So we have discussed ways of us engaging all the key actors flexibly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So we have discussed ways of us engaging all the key actors flexibly.

auth_sentence.content: Without young blood, we'll lose our ability to think flexibly and creatively.
auth_sentence.res_content: Without young blood, we'll lose our ability to think flexibly and creatively.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Without young blood, we'll lose our ability to think flexibly and creatively.
